title: 83/389/EEC: Commission Decision of 29 July 1983 on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structures in France pursuant to Council Directive 72/161/EEC (Only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 29 July 1983
on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structures in France pursuant to Council Directive 72/161/EEC
(Only the French text is authentic)
(83/389/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The provisions introducing courses of preparation for settlement on a farm as notified on 26 April 1983 by the French Government satisfy the conditions for financial contribution by the Community to the common measures as referred to in Article 8 of Directive 72/161/EEC.
This Decision is addressed to the French Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 July 1983.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 96, 23. 4. 1972, p. 15.
(2) OJ No L 193, 3. 7. 1982, p. 37.
